meanings.sent1: Her smile was effortless, showing how happy she was.
meanings.sent2: The dancer moved across the stage effortlessly, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat made catching the mouse look effortless, as if it was all part of a game.
meanings.sent4: His effortless charm could win over anyone he met.
meanings.sent5: The bird soared through the sky effortlessly, a picture of grace and freedom.

meanings.definition: Achieved with ease or minimal effort.
meanings.sent1: The puzzle was so effortless for him to solve, he finished it in minutes.
meanings.sent2: She completed the task effortlessly, impressing her colleagues with her efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the trick look effortless, leaving the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: His effortless victory in the race surprised everyone who underestimated him.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush strokes were so effortless, creating a masterpiece in no time.
